txt.spec_warrior_desc: A balanced melee specialty, with good attack and defense value.## ##Can use swords, great swords and axes.
txt.spec_archer_desc: Good at long-range attacks. ##Low defense value. ## ##Can use bows and crossbows.
txt.spec_mage_desc: Medium-range specialty with low defense value. ##Can use various magic and effects.
txt.mz_sword_iron_desc: A common sword in MzRPG mod.
